name: Trash Game (ThePotatoSack)
description:
LMAO I made this game so I can hopefully re-learn how to make games, download if you want, but it's pretty bad.

Other than that the games about shooting green squares that follow you around, the difficulty curve is REALLY bad in m y opinion, and a lot of times is left to luck due to the fact that there is a chance that the "zombies" can spawn on you, in the walls, or in the obstacles.
